text-primary.description: Primary text color for body copy and main content.

text-secondary.description: Secondary text color for less prominent information or subtext.

text-disabled.description: Text color for disabled interactive elements or content.

text-inverse.description: Text color for use on dark or colored backgrounds.

text-success.description: Text color for success messages or indicators.

text-warning.description: Text color for warning messages or indicators.

text-info.description: Text color for informational messages or indicators.

text-critical.description: Text color for critical errors or destructive action indicators.

border-primary.description: Primary/Default border color for UI elements and separators.

border-inverse.description: Border color for use on dark or colored backgrounds.

border-brand.description: Border color for brand emphasis or brand-related components.

border-success.description: Border color for success state indicators.

border-warning.description: Border color for warning state indicators.

border-info.description: Border color for informational state indicators.

border-critical.description: Border color for critical error state indicators.

background-inverse.description: Background color for inverse-themed sections or components.

background-surface.description: Default surface color for elements like cards, modals.

background-surface-hover.description: Background color for interactive surfaces on hover.

background-surface-selected.description: Background color for selected items or surfaces (brand-tinted).

background-surface-selected-hover.description: Background color for hovered selected items or surfaces.

background-surface-secondary.description: Secondary surface color for subtle differentiation or sections.

background-brand.description: Background color for primary brand actions or highlights.

background-brand-hover.description: Hover state for brand background color.

background-success.description: Background color for success messages or sections.

background-success-bold.description: Stronger background color for emphasized success states.

background-info.description: Background color for informational messages or sections.

background-info-bold.description: Stronger background color for emphasized info states.

background-warning.description: Background color for warning messages or sections.

background-critical.description: Background color for critical error messages or sections.

background-critical-bold.description: Stronger background color for emphasized critical/error states.
